feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.7.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix double "save" modal by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15786
  • SMTP - Cloud send email issue by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15784
  • MS-SQL JSON column fix by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15789
  • Add new pill to auth picker by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15792
  • Track usage by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15772
  • Display grant type field by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15793
  • MySQL ANSI quotes support for queries by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15795
  • Fix pro package resolutions by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15799
  • AI class refactor by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15760
  • [Added] Multi-tenant functionality will need the tenantId in GetLicenseRequest by @jvcalderon in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15797
  • Update pro reference. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15802
  • [Fixed] Wrong user/creator calculation on app init by @jvcalderon in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15798
  • Bump next from 14.2.21 to 14.2.25 in /examples/nextjs-api-sales by @dependabot in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15800
  • Bump @babel/runtime from 7.25.6 to 7.26.10 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15801
  • Custom app scripts by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15762
  • Extract env input component by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15794
  • Cache token on oauth2 usage by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15805
  • Update dd-trace to 5.43.0 by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15804
  • Bump pro to include new license features by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15810
  • Allow using env secrets on oauth2 by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15803
  • OAuth2 documentation links by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15813

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.6.0...3.7.0

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.7.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Disable SCIM logging by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15820

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.7.0...3.7.1

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.7.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Dropping SCIM logs from writethrough cache queue. by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15821

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.7.1...3.7.2

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.7.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • SQL Server updating signatures support by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15831
  • Bull queue observability. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15829
  • Misc fixes by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15814
  • Load CSS/image assets without going through middlewares by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15833

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.7.2...3.7.3

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.7.4
